Posts.Content: Hi Cathy, Ive been awake since 5ish, sleeping tablets didnt wake and woke in agony so decided to go make a cuppa and get the laptop at the same time, I have never had a decent nights sleep since being diagnosed in Jan this year, i think ive come to accept it now. Not even alcohol will help so I sympathise totally with you.Â  Marie xx
Posts.Title: Can't sleep !
